      • createProgramGenerator

        @NonNull
public static nz.co.pltech.arda.program.api.StaticProgramGenerator createProgramGenerator(@NonNull
                                                                                                   android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                                                   android.os.Bundle bundle)
        Create program generator instance based on selected parameters stored in arguments. Mandatory arguments: - Level of experience, Typical distance, Training goal - Event date (for event plans) Optional arguments (otherwise using default suggested values): - Training days, Long day
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        bundle - Bundle with selected parameters
        Returns:
        Program generator instance

      • getMaxEventDate

        public static long getMaxEventDate()
        Program date can't start more than 1 year from today. Don't forget to change R.string.com_intel_fightclub_ui_fragment_error_create_plan_race_day_above_max if you should change this maximum range.
